scripts.pm2-start: if pm2 show eodiro-client ; then npm run pm2-stop && npm run pm2-delete && npm run pm2-start ; else pm2 start npm --name 'eodiro-client' -- run start ; fi
scripts.pm2-restart: if pm2 show eodiro-client ; then pm2 restart eodiro-client ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for eodiro client' ; fi
scripts.pm2-stop: if pm2 show eodiro-client ; then pm2 stop eodiro-client ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for eodiro client' ; fi
scripts.pm2-delete: if pm2 show eodiro-client ; then pm2 delete eodiro-client ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for eodiro client' ; fi
scripts.pm2-reboot: npm install && npm run build && npm run pm2-stop && npm run pm2-delete && npm run pm2-start
scripts.checkout-latest: git reset --hard && git checkout $(git describe --tags `git rev-list --tags --max-count=1`)
scripts.update: git reset --hard && git fetch --prune && npm run checkout-latest && npm install && npm run pm2-reboot
